title: U.S. mining industry total employment 1998 to 2018
summary: In general Number of employees in thousands has rose over the Year.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2014 and 2015.
The highest Number of employees in thousands, of value 842.0 was reached at Year 2014
The lowest Number of employees in thousands, of value 502.0 was reported at Year 2003
